++ ALRIGHT FUCKERS I HOPE Y'ALL READY
++ CUZ WE ABOUT TO GO FULL HAM
++ UP
++ IN
++ THIS
++ BINCH

[[/=]]
-----------------
[[=]]
++++ Hey yo, it's ya boi Fullham. You can also call me Full-of-it, Hammy, DJ Hamhands, Hamsterdance.....call me whatever as long as it's not â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ lmao ðŸ¤£ðŸ’¯ ðŸ’¦

[[collapsible show="MEAT the Author! AHAHAHAHAHA GET IT???!" hideLocation="both" hide="Some people just can't handle my greatness."]]
[[=]]
++++ ##black|THIS ME##
[[/=]]
 ##black|**Name:** Mike##

##black|**Pronouns:** He/him/his preferred, they/them are accepted as well.##

##black|**Age:** 36 (YES I AM OLD)##

##black|**Location:** Minnesota, USA, the place where we constantly complain about the weather but are weirdly stubbornly proud of putting up with it.##

##black|**Interests:** Video games, weird paranormal shit (fucking DUH), reading sci-fi and high fantasy, writing (also DUH), biking, and swimming during the six weeks a year it's warm enough for it here. I also [https://www.twitch.tv/inxecuregaming stream games on Twitch].##

[[/collapsible]]

-------------------------

[[collapsible show="A Cool Collection of Quirky Quotes, Fully Hammed!" hideLocation="both" hide="Oh, not interesting enough for you? Fine, jeez."]]
[[=]]
++++ ##black|THIS IS SHIT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT ME##
[[/=]]

[[*user Quikngruvn]] ##black|said "Ooooh, I see, Fullham. That both makes more sense and less sense."##

[[*user JakdragonX]] ##black|said "The ham, the homeslice, the delectable legend."##

[[*user Hexick]] ##black|said "You're so cool everyone wants you at Sunday dinner."##

[[*user MalyceGraves]] ##black|said "A heart o' gold with a fine set of pipes."##

[[*user Calibold]] ##black|said "Full is an 8/10 person. Doesn't smell awful, wears glasses, but isn't a wizard."##

[[*user Tropinano]] ##black|said "One time I walked into the site19 and there stood Fullham in the biggest fucking hat you've ever seen. I was in shock and said 'where did you get that hat' but was quickly hushed as DrFullham stared at me, looked around hastily and vanished."##

[[*user Proasek]] ##black|said "The more I read from Fullham the more I want die."##

[[*user cybersqyd]] ##black|said "Doctor Fullham is, despite my strongest protests, an author."##

[[*user WhiteGuard]] ##black|said "DrFullham: I would hate and love you at the same time for that."##

[[*user Sonderance]] ##black|said "DrFullham hastened my descent into weebdom, and for that he will never be forgiven. He also gives pretty good crit."##

[[*user Marceline_Raynes]] ##black|said "You make me regret learning how to read sometimes."##

[[*user ghosteater]] ##black|said "I'm gonna fuckin headbutt you."##

[[*user The_Spider_Queen]] ##black|said "Fullham is definitely a ham. Not a very good one, but at least edible."##

[[*user HarryBlank]] ##black|said "I didn't know you can get an authorpage by titling other people's stuff."##

[[*user Cyvstvi13]] ##black|said "You're alright."##

[[*user oboebandgeek99]] ##black|said "I get sea captain vibes from you. Or like, mad sea captain crossed with eldritch horror. But like a nice eldritch horror."##

[[*user drkens]] ##black|said "DrFullham is a raccoon slut, like me."##

[[*user thatdudeoverthere]] ##black|said "imma quote you in the future."##

[[*user HarryBlank]] ##black|said "Getting beaten to a pun by Fullham is like getting beaten to launching a satellite by the Moon."##

[[*user BattleblockB0ss]] ##black|said "DrFullham is exactly what he says: no more or less than a single entire ham. If nothing else can be said for him, he's honest."##

[[*user Purplayoss]] ##black|said "menadrs a hav skav escoost?"##

[[*user Angryman22]] ##black|said "There's a quote for your author page, lmao"##

[[*user Cydhra]] ##black|said "up up down down left right left right full ham"##

[[/collapsible]]

--------------

[[collapsible show="A Hamtastic Harem of Holy Hogwash aka my writing!" hideLocation="both" hide="Wow you don't even want to read my stuff, why'd you even come here then?"]]

[[tabview]]

[[tab Series 4]]

[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="SCP-3608"]]
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "PTSD: Post-Traumatic Stress Dimension" (+%%rating%%)##
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: July 9, 2018##
[[/=]]
> ##black|This was my first ever SCP, and it took me ages to write. The earliest drafts were a sad ripoff of [[[SCP-093 | SCP-093]]] and people were quick to tell me such. After two years of editing and polishing, it was finally to a point where I felt comfortable posting it in the fall of 2018. ##
> 
> ##black|As of 21/06/2020, I have done a fairly major rewrite and shaved off about 1500 words thanks to the lovely [[*user cybersqyd]]. Ve helped me trim the fat and cut out a lot of stuff that didn't really help the narrative, and for that ve has my eternal gratitude. [[*user MalyceGraves]]'s advice also prompted me to remove every single blackbox on the page. ##
> 
> ##black|Fun fact: The original title was "The Living Dimension", which I changed to "Knock Knock Knockin' on Fear's Door" after the rewrites in 2020. Then, [[*user ghosteater]] on IRC gave me the current, much better title. ##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 7650##

[[/tab]]

[[tab Series 5]]

[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="SCP-4836"]]
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "I Love You Beary Much" (+%%rating%%)##
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: December 30, 2019##
[[/=]]
> ##black|What is and will probably remain my most emotional SCP. It's based on the fact that I really love my mom who is thankfully still with us. Wrote this in about two months after the first time I graced the IRC chats with my presence.##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 2000##

[[/tab]]

[[tab Series 6]]

[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="SCP-5836"]]  
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "To Nobel Peace You Must Prepare For War" (+%%rating%%)##  
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: March 10, 2020##
[[/=]]
> ##black|My first entry for 144-hour Jamcon 2020, the theme was **EXPLOSIONS**. I stared at my signed photo of Mr. Torgue for inspiration as I wrote it. It's both my shortest SCP and the shortest time I've spent writing an SCP, 6-8 hours total. And since you foolish fools foolishy voted to keep it on the site, now this page exists.##
> 
> ##black|I hope you all learn from your mistake. ##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 500##
[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="SCP-5608"]]
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "The Delectable Taste of Cognition" (+%%rating%%)##  
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: March 12, 2020##
[[/=]]
> ##black|144-hour Jamcon 2020 entry #2, theme was **DELICIOUS**. Credit to the "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Deleted_articles_with_freaky_titles Deleted Wikipedia pages with freaky titles]" page for giving me "Scrambled brains on toast" which inspired this grotesque horror.##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 1150##
[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="SCP-5447"]]
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "Art Imitates Life" (+%%rating%%)## 
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: June 28, 2020##
[[/=]]
> ##black|My pinch-hit entry for the 2020 Exquisite Corpse contest. I had a lot of fun writing this, even if I was in a blind panic for much of the roughly 48 hours I had to write it. Thanks [[*user foodandbeverage]] for providing the containment procedures!##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 1400##

[[/tab]]

[[tab Series 7]]

[[=]]
-----
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6608"]]
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "I Saw The Light" (+%%rating%%)## 
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: July 23, 2021##
[[/=]]
> ##black|Been working on this one since December of 2019 and there is //no// reason it should have taken me that long. Inspired by the photo, which was actually an r/SCP fuel post.##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 2650##



[[/tab]]

[[tab Series 8]]

[[=]]
-----
[[module ListPages name="SCP-7225"]]
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "I'm Dreaming of a White Christmas" (+%%rating%%)## 
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: December 12, 2022##
[[/=]]
> ##black|This was an idea that randomly popped into my head when I discovered there wasn't an SCP with this title yet. It started out with an idea for a heartwarming yet slightly bittersweet tale of a man who longed to revisit the snowy Christmases of his youth. It was meant to be a sort of "be careful what you wish for" kind of story, with a sprinkling of "you can't go back to the way things were." Instead, I was struck with a completely different idea when I was writing, and it became this.##
> 
> ##black|As of January 6th, 2023, this became my first ever SCP to reach or exceed a +100 rating. ##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 650##

[[/tab]]

[[tab Joke SCPs]]

[[=]]
-----
[[module ListPages name="JJJ-JJJJ-J"]]
+++++ ##black|%%title_linked%%: "JIt's Ja Joke" (+%%rating%%)## 
[[/module]]
##black|Joriginal Jost Jate: January Jwenty-jeventh, jwo-jhousand jand jwenty-jhree##
[[/=]]
> ##black|Jhis jis ja jerrible joke JJJ jhat jI jrote jin jabout jan jour jafter jIRC jhat jembers jold je jit jas junny. JI jake jo jesponsiblity jor jhis.##
> 
> ##black|Jppx. jord jount: Jwo jundred jand jifteen##

[[/tab]]

[[tab Tales]]

[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="The Hanging Tree"]]
+++++ ##black|Canon Renaissance Contest: "%%title_linked%%" (+%%rating%%)##
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: October 14, 2020##
[[/=]]
> ##black|My contribution to the __Team With No Name__'s Aces and Eights entries for Canon Renaissance Contest. This was a blast to write and I'm happy my first ever tale on the wiki was pretty well received!##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 650##


[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="The Tale of Richie and Mitchy"]]
+++++ ##black|CupidCon 2021 Tale: "%%title_linked%%" (+%%rating%%)##
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: February 20, 2021##
[[/=]]
> ##black|My entry to the CupidCon 2021 contest. I waited until the last day of the contest because I was just not feeling inspired, but then reading the other entries got me all fired up and I basically didn't sleep the night I wrote this. I had a blast and it was received better than I ever imagined.##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 1600##


[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="Breaching Boredom"]]
+++++ ##black|[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-15338208/miku-s-challenge Miku's Challenge]: "%%title_linked%%" (+%%rating%%)##
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: March 12, 2021##
[[/=]]

> ##black|A short, personal vent piece about the mundanity of quarantine mixing with depression, and the need for something, //anything// exciting to happen.##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 350##

[[=]]
----
[[module ListPages name="A Stitch in Time Saved Mine"]]
+++++ ##black|Deptcon 2022 Tale: "%%title_linked%%" (+%%rating%%)##
[[/module]]
##black|Original post date: February 14, 2022##
[[/=]]

> ##black|A short-ish tale about the dangers of messing with the flow of time. My contribution for the Department of Prescience for Deptcon 2022.##
> 
> ##black|Appx. word count: 820##

[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]

[[/collapsible]]

--------------------

[[collapsible show="Actually Amazing Acts of Art from Amazing Avatars of Awesomeness!" hide="Where are you going this art is so good!" hideLocation="both"]]

> ##black|I had this lovely image of SCP-3608 impromptu-drawn for me by the amazing [[*user Skorpt]]!!! I appreciate it so much and love how well they got across a complex idea in such a straightforward image! [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/what-s-an-art-style-skorpt-s-art-page You can find her art page here!]##
> [[=]]
> [[image https://i.imgur.com/PsGcKBe.png]]
> [[/=]]

---------------------------

> ##black|Artist [[*user Aethris]] also drew this incredible GIF of 4836, again, without me even asking! The artists here are so heckin' great and generous! [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/aethris-art You can find her art page here!]##
> [[=]]
> [[image https://i.imgur.com/tZN2RrF.gif]]
> [[/=]]


-----------------------

> ##black|I commissioned this lovely pic of an epilogue scene of my two lovey dovey boys Richie and Mitchy from [[*user ghosteater]] and he did a fantastic job! [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/war-s-art-box You can find his art page here!]##
> [[=]]
> [[image https://i.imgur.com/KRRxiX7.png]]
> [[/=]]

-----------------------

> ##black|[[*user Robyrne]] also did this amazing drawing of Ritchie and Mitchy - I like to imagine this as the first time they met. [https://robyrne-the-artist.tumblr.com You can find his tumblr here!!!]##
> [[=]]
> [[image https://64.media.tumblr.com/da9ff51f2bf6c2a0bbccc0d31a6afa3f/883d3318e8166efb-83/s540x810/a308af0dbcbc96914bef8251d39bbc476185b61a.png]]
> [[/=]]

[[/collapsible]]

---------------------------------

[[collapsible show="Listen as I say the words that the other people wrote!" hide="Yeah, I hate hearing me talk too."]]

+++++ ##black|Due to changes in the file size rules, I have started a [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChce1ubHEvfxlhhFqPNZvkQ YouTube channel] for my readings.##

[[collapsible show="Funny Flippant Fullham Facts and Features!" hide="The knowledge was clearly too much for your simple beef-based brain."]]

##black|**Name:** Dr. Henry James Alexander Fullham##

##black|**Gender/Sex:** Male/Male##

##black|**Featured in:** ##

##black|[[[SCP-5018 | SCP-5018: "The Broken Rose"]]], both a name mention and the voice of Director Bold.##

##black|[[[SCP-6661 | SCP-6661: "Problem?"]]], as the researcher in the audio log.## 

##black|[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/vikander-kneed-technical-media-hub The Vikander-Kneed Technical Media Hub], as the welcome voice.##

##black|[[[SCP-7419 | SCP-7419: "Marianne Simmons Will Buy A Bagel At Wynnsbury's"]]], as the voice of the device.## 

##black|[[[SCP-7783 | SCP-7783: "SPHERE"]]], as the voice of Junior Researcher Winston Middelberg.##
